comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: Notice that Ernst Udet (right side) is wearing an RFC/RAF observer's tunic w/ winged "O" insignia! The fellow on the left is close friend and ace Ltn. Erich Löwenhardt of Jasta 10 who was killed shortly thereafter when he bailed out of his yellow Fokker D.VII following a collision. His parachute failed to open and he was killed when he hit the ground.
